item.title: Fire disrupts operations at Raichur Thermal Power Station
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur: A fire erupted in the fourth unit of the Raichur Thermal Power Station (RTPS) located in Shaktinagar on Sunday, resulting in significant damage and the subsequent shutdown of the unit.The blaze, which originated in the power transformer, spread quickly. Despite the efforts of the unit's workers to extinguish the flames, they were unable to bring the situation under control. The transformer was gutted, and other equipment sustained damage, according to sources.The full extent of losses c...]]>
item.author: Tnn
